$AAPL picks $GOOGL Gemini to power an AI-enhanced version of Siri later this year.

That puts Google‚Äôs AI inside one of the largest consumer platforms in the world as the stock just crossed a $4T market cap for the first time.

$NVDA & $LLY will invest up to $1B in a joint AI lab focused on drug discovery & development.

It‚Äôs another sign the next phase of the AI economy is moving into high-value industry workflows like Healthcare AI.

HOW $GOOGL IS BUILT FOR THE NEW DIGITAL ECONOMY

‚Ä¢ AI chips designs TPUs to keep AI compute cheap & controllable as inference becomes a margin business
‚Ä¢ Robotics invests in embodied AI through Apptronik to automate physical work once software automation saturates
‚Ä¢ Drones owns Wing to remove labor & time costs from last-mile logistics as commerce moves toward instant fulfillment
‚Ä¢ Space holds exposure to launch, satellite connectivity & Earth data via $ASTS, $PL & SpaceX
‚Ä¢ Autonomy operates Waymo to replace human labor with software in in transportation which is one of the largest cost centers in the economy
‚Ä¢ AI models builds Gemini & advances reasoning, planning & agents through DeepMind while backing Anthropic to avoid single-model dependence
‚Ä¢ AI security acquires Wiz & Mandiant to make AI infrastructure trustworthy enough for enterprise & regulated use
‚Ä¢ Healthcare AI backs $TEM & $PRME to apply AI inside regulated, data-rich clinical workflows where spend is non-discretionary
‚Ä¢ AI distribution & Cloud runs a ~$60B ARR platform that hosts AI workloads & deploys new capabilities instantly to billions of users
‚Ä¢ Agentic AI embeds agents into Search & Workspace so AI can execute tasks end-to-end inside Google‚Äôs ecosystem

$DUOL said CFO Matt Skaruppa is stepping down after ~6 years.

The company also posted preliminary Q4 metrics with DAU up ~30% YoY and bookings of $330M‚Äì$336M vs. Est. $334M.

$WMT & $GOOGL owned drone delivery company Wing are expanding drone delivery to 150 additional stores with Houston launching January 15.

Once complete, the rollout will make the service available to ~40M Americans across major U.S. metros.

Tempus is positioning itself to build the largest oncology-focused foundation model by embedding its data platform directly into next-gen drug discovery workflows.

Put another way, Nvidia's $NVDA FY27 estimated FCF is more than 2.5X higher than AMD's $AMD projected FY27 revenue of $61.9 billion.

Nvidia $NVDA is expected to generate more than $158 billion in free cash flow in fiscal 2027, up from ~$97 billion estimated for fiscal 2026. 

For comparison, FY27‚Äôs estimate is more than 40X higher than 2023‚Äôs $3.8 billion.

Everyone is chasing the next SpaceX.

That‚Äôs not where the money is.

The real winners of the space boom don‚Äôt go to space at all - they sell picks & shovels to everyone who does.

Here are the Global Space Industry enablers set up for 2026:

üõ∞ Satellite operators
$AMZN (Project Kuiper), $ASTS, $GSAT, $IRDM, $VSAT, $BKSY, $PL

üöÄ Launch & access to orbit
$RKLB, $SPCE (private: SpaceX, ULA)

üß† Manufacturing, defense & supply chain
$LMT, $NOC, $RTX, $BA, $HON, $TDY, $PLTR, $BAESY, $HEI

üõ∞ Space infrastructure & services
$LUNR, $MNTS, $VOYG

These companies get paid whether missions succeed or fail.

That‚Äôs where the real leverage is.
